products.name: Warburtons Old English Medium Sliced White Bread 400G
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality wheat flour to ensure a soft texture.","Baked using traditional methods for authentic taste.","Packaging is recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Contains no artificial preservatives, maintaining natural quality."]

products.name: Peanut Butter (Creamy)
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Made primarily from roasted peanuts, sugar, and salt.","Peanut butter production can have a lower carbon footprint compared to other nut butters due to the efficiency of peanut farming.","Many brands use sustainable farming practices to source their peanuts, promoting ecological balance.","Creamy peanut butter is often processed to remove the natural oils, resulting in a smoother texture and longer shelf life."]

products.name: Dairymilk buttons
products.categories: Snacks,Sweet snacks,Cocoa and its products,Confectioneries,Chocolates,Milk chocolates
products.facts: ["Dairymilk buttons are made from high-quality milk chocolate, ensuring a creamy texture and rich flavor.","The packaging of Dairymilk buttons is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Dairymilk chocolate is sourced from cocoa beans that are ethically traded, supporting sustainable farming practices.","The product is free from artificial preservatives and colors, maintaining a focus on natural ingredients."]

products.name: Diced Pimentos
products.facts: ["Diced pimentos are made from ripe red peppers, specifically the Capsicum annuum variety.","Pimentos are often grown in warm climates, contributing to local agricultural economies and biodiversity.","High-quality diced pimentos should have a vibrant red color and a sweet, mild flavor without any signs of spoilage.","Diced pimentos are low in calories and rich in vitamins A and C, making them a nutritious addition to various dishes."]

products.name: Quick Cooking White Oats
products.facts: ["Quick Cooking White Oats are made from whole grain oats, providing essential nutrients and fiber.","The production of oats typically requires less water compared to other grains, making it more eco-friendly.","Quick Cooking White Oats are often processed to retain a high level of quality and nutritional value while reducing cooking time.","They are usually packaged in recyclable materials, promoting sustainability and reducing environmental impact."]

products.name: Jif peanut butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Breakfasts, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Sweet spreads, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, fr:Pâtes à tartiner, Nut butters, Peanut butters, Creamy-peanut-butter
products.facts: ["Jif peanut butter is made primarily from roasted peanuts, sugar, and hydrogenated vegetable oils.","The packaging for Jif peanut butter is recyclable, promoting better ecological practices.","Jif peanut butter is made without artificial preservatives, ensuring a higher quality product.","Jif sources its peanuts from U.S. farmers, supporting local agriculture and reducing carbon footprint."]

products.name: Nature Valley Crunchy Oats 'N Honey
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain oats as the primary ingredient.","Contains no artificial flavors or colors.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Rich in fiber, contributing to a balanced diet."]

products.name: 李錦記熊貓牌鮮味蠔油
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality oyster extract and natural ingredients.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives.","Sustainably sourced oysters to minimize environmental impact.","Certified for quality assurance and meets food safety standards."]

products.name: Pure Life
products.facts: ["Pure Life bottles are made from 100% recyclable PET plastic.","The brand emphasizes sustainable sourcing of its water from natural springs.","Pure Life implements eco-friendly practices in its production process to minimize carbon footprint.","The quality of Pure Life water is regularly tested to ensure it meets safety and purity standards."]

products.name: Pan De Harina De Trigo Integral Cero Cero
products.facts: ["Made from whole wheat flour, providing higher fiber content than regular flour.","Produced using eco-friendly practices, minimizing environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring natural quality.","Packaged in recyclable materials to promote sustainability."]
